data.title: When Shraddha Nigam broke her silence on divorce with Karan Singh Grover: 'I had tried everything'
data.meta_description: Shraddha Nigam is celebrating her birthday today! On the occasion let's talk about the time when she broke her silence on her divorce from Karan Singh Grover.
data.text:
Television stars Karan Singh Grover and Shraddha Nigam were considered to be the IT couple in the telly world. The two met via a common photographer friend and interestingly enough they saw each other's pictures at his studio at different times. Then the two met at an event and complimented each other over the pictures and that's how the conversation began for the duo. Eventually, they started meeting at different parties.

They fell in love quickly and were spotted at various events together. Shraddha and Karan tied the know in 2008. For a while, the Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii actress kept silent on the issue.

Later in an interview with DNA, she opened up on the issue and said, "I wouldn’t judge it as a setback. Maybe, in the long run, everything happens for the best. A marriage breaking up is a sad episode. I had tried everything under the sun to not let this happen. But since that didn’t work, I have picked myself up and I am glad to have bounced back"

The actress then added, "Despite all (my) efforts it didn’t work. I don’t want to break my head or break the other person’s head about why it happened to me."

Later, in 2012 she married the telly actor Mayank Anand. The couple has jointly owned a fashion line since 2011. Meanwhile, KSG got hitched with popular telly star Jennifer Winget. The two got hitched on April 9, 2012. The couple separated in 2014. He then married actress Bipasha Basu on April 30, 2016.

Coming back to Shraddha, the actress was last seen in the reality television series Kalakarz. Apart from her telly stints, she has also been busy with her entrepreneurial ventures.
